item.title: Understanding underperformance - a core management skill
item.description: Underperformance doesn’t fix itself—early, fair intervention is essential for individual and team success. This article outlines practical steps for managers.

item.title: How to assess productivity in a remote context
item.description: The blog post discusses the various approaches and strategies that companies can use to assess productivity when offering remote work opportunities to their employees.

item.title: Measuring success in global teams
item.description: In this blog post, we will discuss quantitative and qualitative metrics for evaluating team performance, such as project completion rates, team satisfaction surveys, and feedback from clients or stakeholders.

item.title: Why employee engagement is the key to business success
item.description: This post introduces the concept of employee engagement and explains why it’s important for businesses. It also highlights some of the key benefits of engagement.

item.title: Giving feedback that drives change
item.description: Effective feedback is a powerful tool for driving change and improving performance when delivered thoughtfully.

item.title: Understanding effective performance management
item.description: Effective performance management enhances motivation, engagement, and overall team success when done right.
